arts.ttl: Atletico struggles to understand penalty call after losing to Lille in Champions League game
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone and his players were struggling to understand the penalty call that went against them in a 3-1 home loss to Lille in the Champions League on Wednesday. The call came after a loose ball inside the area, with Atletico players saying that Italian referee Marco Guida made the decision after seeing a handball by midfielder Koke Resurrección.

arts.ttl: David's double helps Lille to another famous Madrid win
arts.sum: After beating Real Madrid on match week two, Jonathan David scores a brace to help Lille secure a 3-1 upset win Atletico Madrid on match week three of the Champions League at the Riyadh Air Metropolitano.

arts.ttl: Lille stun Atlético to do double on Madrid teams
arts.sum: Lille's Jonathan David scored twice as the French side stunned hosts Atletico Madrid with a 3-1 comeback Champions League win on Wednesday to make it two wins from their last two matches while piling more pressure on the struggling Spanish team.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Atlético Madrid 1-3 Lille: Bruno Génésio’s substitutes stun Metropolitano Stadium
arts.sum: UEFA Champions League, Round 3, 23/10/24 After defeating Real Madrid in the previous round of Champions League fixtures, Lille OSC would be travelling to the Spanish capital to take on…

arts.ttl: Atletico raises awareness of fans with disabilities at Champions League game
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid raised awareness about inclusion with activities for fans with disabilities at its Champions League match against Lille on Wednesday. The club and its partners were looking to host “the most inclusive Champions League match of all time” and break the record of 1,740 fans with disabilities set by Real Betis against Valladolid in the Spanish league last year, according to UEFA.

arts.ttl: Leeds close in on former Atletico Madrid star on a free transfer - as Daniel Farke targets cover in defence and midfield amid injury woe
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: The 34-year old has been at Leeds United's Thorp Arch training ground over the past week and has been photographed with supporters at Elland Road during Friday game.

arts.ttl: Madrid or Baku to host '27 Champions League final
arts.sum: UEFA has confirmed that Madrid or Baku will stage the 2027 Champions League final after the capital cities of Spain and Azerbaijan stepped in to replace Milan as host of the showpiece fixture.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid predicted XI v Lille: Clement Lenglet out, Antoine Griezmann to start
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid go into their UEFA Champions League fixture against Lille OSC somewhat depleted at the back. There are multiple absentees for the La Liga side in this sector, including…

arts.ttl: Lille predicted XI v Atletico Madrid: Mitchel Bakker adds to growing injury list
arts.sum: Lille OSC head into their UEFA Champions League encounter against Atletico Madrid severely depleted. Mitchell Bakker, substituted early in the game against AS Monaco on Friday, is the latest casualty…

arts.ttl: Champions League predictions: Wednesday's Matchday 3 fixtures
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid tasted a shock 4-0 defeat to Benfica on Matchday 2 but should bounce back with victory against French side Lille on Wednesday. But Liverpool, Manchester City, Inter, Atletico Madrid and Bayer Leverkusen are among the other teams in action, with a few minnows hoping to cause an upset.
